department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: This is an Invitation to Supply
full_summary:
**Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest**
===============

**File Number and Title**
-----------------------

File Number: R.125817
Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest for the Availability of Lands for Sale in Various Municipalities in the Province of Ontario

**Notice Information**
-------------------

* **Notice Reference Number**: cb-6964-16427583
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: R.125817

**Publication and Closing Dates**
-------------------------------

* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-31T17:00:00 (Expired)

**Tender Description**
--------------------

The Government of Canada, represented by Public Works and Government Services Canada, invites interested parties to submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) for the availability of lands for sale in various municipalities in the province of Ontario. The EOI includes the provision of real estate services (UNSPSC code: 80130000).

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

Submissions will be assessed on criteria that may include variations or combinations of the following:

* Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Address: 4900 Yonge Street, 10th floor, Toronto, Ontario M2N 6A6, Canada
	+ Phone: (647) 355-5595
	+ Email: [jessica.chia@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.chia@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)

**Attachments**
----------------

[Download the English tenders document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6964/eoi-canadabuys-en---aothr-%28final.pdf)

[Download the French tenders document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6964/eoi-canadabuys-en---aothr-%28final_tg_fr_final.pdf)

I have edited your output as follows:

* Changed the formatting and introduced headings to improve readability.
* Condensed and rephrased certain sections for clarity and concision.
* Standardized terminology for better consistency.
* Removed unnecessary or redundant information.
* Made minor corrections to punctuation and grammar for better clarity.

Please let me know
